metadata.job_title: Senior Data Engineer â€“ Commerce Data Pipelines

seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 3+ years experience, which aligns with senior level in data engineering roles

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on ETL pipelines, data modeling, and SQL tuning

sub_specialty.evidence: Must-have skills include ETL design/development, Airflow orchestration, and performance tuning for batch pipelines

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing teams or mentoring; responsibilities focus on individual technical execution and cross-functional collaboration

primary_cloud.evidence: Redshift is explicitly mentioned as a required skill, which is an AWS service

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms mentioned in skills or responsibilities

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL pipelines, Airflow orchestration, and scheduled data processing implies batch processing

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow explicitly listed as a required ETL orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake and Redshift are both data warehouse technologies explicitly mentioned

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid model requiring 4 days onsite in Seattle, Santa Monica, or NYC implies regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Locations specified (Seattle, Santa Monica, NYC) are all in North American time zones

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid model with 4 days onsite in specific cities implies relocation may be required if not already in those locations

h1b_friendly.evidence: Explicitly states 'All valid EADs except OPT, CPT, H1B' - H1B is excluded

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Explicitly excludes OPT and CPT from acceptable work authorization

citizenship_required.evidence: Accepts GC, USC, and valid EADs - no citizenship requirement beyond work authorization

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Explicitly states 'on W2 depending on experience (no C2C or 1099 or sub-contract)'

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career progression, promotion paths, or growth opportunities

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, senior guidance, or collaborative learning environments

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have list with no nice-to-haves, but requirements are reasonable for senior level (3+ years, core data engineering skills)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering with specific responsibilities around ETL pipelines, data modeling, and SQL tuning

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (SQL, ETL, Airflow, Snowflake/Redshift) are standard for senior data engineers with 3+ years experience
